articles.description: The Gunners are exploring ways of financing a deal for Szoboszlai, though they will face stiff competition from other European giants to land the highly-rated RB Salzburg man
articles.content:
Arsenal are exploring ways to structure a deal for highly-rated midfielder Dominik Szoboszlai, who has a £23million release clause at RB Salzburg.
Szoboszlai, 20, has already racked up 22 goals in 7… [+2707 chars]

articles.title: Lionel Messi transfer questions lead to angry refusal from Barcelona boss Ronald Koeman - Mirror Online
articles.description: Lionel Messi returned from international duty this week to declare himself "tired of always being the problem for everything at the club," and with increased questions over his long-term future
articles.content:
Ronald Koeman refused to answer questions over Lionel Messis long-term future as he called for more respect for the Barcelona superstar.

articles.title: Rebekah Vardy fails to raise a smile as she heads to Dancing On Ice training - Daily Mail
articles.description: Rebekah Vardy failed to raise a smile when she arrived at Dancing On Ice training on Friday.
articles.content:
Rebekah Vardy failed to raise a smile when she arrived at Dancing On Ice training on Friday.
